sections.heading: What is Wingman?
sections.content: Wingman is an AI-powered assistant designed to help monitor, analyze, and improve MRO (Maintenance, Repair, and Operations) and Reliability operations across sites and airlines. Built on Databricks, Wingman provides real-time insights and natural language access to your operational data.

sections.heading: Key Features
bullets: Natural language queries for operational data
Integration with Genie Rooms and Vector Search
Python code execution for custom analysis

sections.heading: Getting Started
sections.content: Select an agent from the chat interface and start asking questions about your MRO operations. You can explore weekly metrics, view projections, search technical notes, and much more - all through natural conversation.
